description: In honor of Twitter's initial public offering, scheduled for tomorrow, today's show is all about Twitter. Bells will ring, investors will line up and company leaders are hoping that the New York Stock Exchange will not repeat the NASDAQ's bungling of Facebook's IPO last year. But it won't just be Twitter's employees and potential investors who are watching. A lot of people in the tech world think Twitter's IPO is signaling an important moment for the industry.

title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, November 6, 2013
